effet: Connection – Needle Arm. Whenever the user hits a target with a Physical Melee attack, that target loses a Tick of Hit Points.
For every allied Electric-Type Pokémon cardinally adjacent to the user, the triggering Attack deals an additional +3 Damage.
Connection – Barrage. The user receives STAB when using Barrage and Egg Bomb. These Moves deal Damage as if one step more effective on 16+.
